The list of ingredients is very short and

cereal and your fruity cereal, now you don't
want to do half and half because it'll be

too strong of a fruity flavor, so I do three
quarters of the rice cereal and one quarter

of the fruity, but you can do half and half,
you can do whatever your heart desires because
you're the boss apple sauce.
